mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.perm_key FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.perm_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.perm_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order
